short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beautiful Scenery for Your Browser, Transform your browser with stunning nature backgrounds!,

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser with stunning nature backgrounds! Our Nature Art extension provides you with a wide variety of beautiful scenery images, including mountains, forests, beaches, and more. Whether you want to relax, feel inspired, or simply enjoy a change of scenery, our extension has you covered.

Nature Art replaces your default chrome backgrounds with breathtaking nature images. Simply install the extension and our images library will be rotated through images automatically with a new stunning background every time you open a new tab.

Our images are carefully selected and optimized for use as backgrounds, ensuring that they will look great on any screen size. Plus, our extension is lightweight and won't slow down your browsing experience.

The Nature Art extension changes your search engine in the new tab to Bing and provides the features below:
- Stunning nature background images
- Useful links for easy enter to all the popular search engines
- Convenient web search powered by Bing.com search results. With it, you can easily search for your favorite topics, images, videos, and news

This extension is free to download from the Chrome Web store, and you can uninstall it at any time.

By installing and using the Nature Art extension you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Please review our Privacy Policy for details regarding the information we collect when you install and use the extension.
 
For more information please check:
